data.text: @Mando05474111 @datboijhoson @shak3342 @DiscussingFilm What “character oriented” stories are u talking abt. They only focus on 3 peoples storyline in s2 while the whole plot is just sex, shootings , drugs

@damianratedr @DiscussingFilm This doesn’t lead to 15-16 hour days on set. An issue that has been rampant in the industry long before covid. The IATSE strike of last year was all about long days with short turnarounds. And covid certainly didn’t make Sam Levinson come to set with no shot list.
@DiscussingFilm Yall acting as if they were being accused of assault. It was just long hours poor actors!!!  They’re getting pod 500k an episode but can’t work more than 5 hours
